description:
Subaru awakens on the beach again... but this time he`s buried in the sand. Who could have done this?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Re: Petit - Re: Petit kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Petit 10 - Bonnou ni Aragau dake
Re:Petit - Re: Starting Life in Another World from Petit - Petit 10 - Just Resisting Desires of the Flesh
Re:ぷち Re:プチから始める異世界生活 ぷち10 煩悩に抗うだけ
